import React from "react"; const About = () => { return (

About Our Ticket Booking Service

Welcome to PEAS - your one-stop platform for exploring and booking tickets to the most popular museums across Tamil Nadu! Our mission is to make your cultural and historical journey seamless, enjoyable, and memorable.

Our Mission

We aim to connect people with Tamil Nadu’s rich heritage through easy and hassle-free ticket booking. Whether you're planning a visit to Chennai’s Government Museum or exploring Thanjavur’s historic art, PEAS ensures a smooth booking experience for all age groups.

Why Book With Us?

  • Simple and quick booking with ChatBot assistance.
  • Information about the best museums in Tamil Nadu.
  • Trusted and secure ticket reservation system.
  • Friendly support for all your cultural explorations!

Discover. Experience. Cherish Tamil Nadu’s heritage with PEAS!

); }; export default About;
